patthana4.8:1.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:2.1: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:3.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:6.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:7.1: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:8.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:9.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare …pe… nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana4.8:10.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:11.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:12.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā dve …pe… āsevane dve …pe… jhāne magge dve …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:14.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto araṇo dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:15.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto araṇo dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:16.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare samanantare satta, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane dve, kamme pañca, vipāke āhāre indriye tīṇi, jhāne magge dve, sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:18.1: Vipākadhammadhammaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:21.1: Vipākaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca vipāko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:22.1: Vipākadhammadhammaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:23.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:24.1: Vipākaṁ araṇañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca vipāko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:25.1: Vipākadhammadhammaṁ araṇañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:26.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā nava …pe… purejāte tīṇi, āsevane dve …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:28.1: Vipāko araṇo dhammo vipākassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:29.1: Vipākadhammadhammo araṇo dhammo vipākadhammadhammassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:30.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo araṇo dhammo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:31.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… sahajāte ekādasa, aññamaññe satta …pe… āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke tīṇi …pe… indriye nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:33.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:36.1: Upādinnupādāniyaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādinnupādāniyo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:37.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:38.1: Anupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnaanupādāniyo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:39.1: Upādinnupādāniyaṁ araṇañca anupādinnupādāniyaṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:40.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṁ araṇañca anupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:41.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… āsevane dve …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:43.1: Upādinnupādāniyo araṇo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:44.1: Anupādinnupādāniyo araṇo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:45.1: Anupādinnaanupādāniyo araṇo dhammo anupādinnaanupādāniyassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:46.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… nissaye ekādasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte satta, pacchājāte nava, āsevane dve, kamme aṭṭha, vipāke cha, āhāre dvādasa, indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte dasa …pe… avigate tevīsa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:48.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:51.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:52.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:53.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ araṇañca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:54.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana4.8:55.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko araṇo dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:56.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko araṇo dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:57.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā …pe… samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:59.1: Savitakkasavicāraṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Savitakkasavicāraṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Savitakkasavicāraṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro saraṇo ca avitakkavicāramatto saraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:60.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:61.1: Savitakkasavicāraṁ saraṇañca avitakkavicāramattaṁ saraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:64.1: Savitakkasavicāraṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana4.8:65.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana4.8:66.1: Avitakkaavicāraṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:67.1: Hetuyā sattatiṁsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā tevīsa …pe… aññamaññe aṭṭhavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane ekādasa …pe… avigate sattatiṁsa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:69.1: Pītisahagataṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:70.1: Sukhasahagataṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:71.1: Upekkhāsahagataṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:72.1: Pītisahagataṁ saraṇañca sukhasahagataṁ saraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:75.1: Pītisahagato saraṇo dhammo pītisahagatassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:76.1: Sukhasahagato saraṇo dhammo sukhasahagatassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:77.1: Upekkhāsahagato saraṇo dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:78.1: Pītisahagato saraṇo ca sukhasahagato saraṇo ca dhammā pītisahagatassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:79.1: Hetuyā dasa, ārammaṇe soḷasa, adhipatiyā soḷasa …pe… upanissaye soḷasa …pe… avigate dasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:81.1: Pītisahagataṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:84.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:85.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:88.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:91.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:92.1: Ācayagāmiṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ācayagāmī saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:95.1: Ācayagāmiṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ācayagāmī araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:96.1: Apacayagāmiṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca apacayagāmī araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:97.1: Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:98.1: Ācayagāmiṁ araṇañca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:99.1: Apacayagāmiṁ araṇañca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:100.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:102.1: Ācayagāmī araṇo dhammo ācayagāmissa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:103.1: Apacayagāmī araṇo dhammo apacayagāmissa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:104.1: Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī araṇo dhammo nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:105.1: Ācayagāmī araṇo dhammo ācayagāmissa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:106.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:108.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:111.1: Sekkhaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sekkhaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sekkhaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho araṇo ca nevasekkhanāsekkho araṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:112.1: Asekkhaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:113.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:114.1: Sekkhaṁ araṇañca nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ …pe… hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:115.1: Asekkhaṁ araṇañca nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:116.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:118.1: Sekkho araṇo dhammo sekkhassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:119.1: Asekkho araṇo dhammo asekkhassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:120.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho araṇo dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:121.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā nava, anantare aṭṭha …pe… upanissaye aṭṭha …pe… āsevane dve, kamme aṭṭha, vipāke satta …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:123.1: Parittaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paritto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:126.1: Parittaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paritto araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:127.1: Mahaggataṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:128.1: Appamāṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:129.1: Parittaṁ araṇañca mahaggataṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca paritto araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:130.1: Parittaṁ araṇañca appamāṇaṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca paritto araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:131.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe satta …pe… purejāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:133.1: Parittārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:134.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:137.1: Parittārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:138.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:139.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:142.1: Hīnaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hīno saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:144.1: Majjhimaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:145.1: Paṇītaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paṇīto araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:146.1: Majjhimaṁ araṇañca paṇītaṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:147.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:149.1: Micchattaniyataṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca micchattaniyato saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:150.1: Aniyataṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:153.1: Sammattaniyataṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sammattaniyato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sammattaniyataṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sammattaniyataṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sammattaniyato araṇo ca aniyato araṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:154.1: Aniyataṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:155.1: Sammattaniyataṁ araṇañca aniyataṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:156.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana4.8:157.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:158.1: Maggahetukaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:159.1: Maggādhipatiṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana4.8:160.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ araṇañca maggādhipatiṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:161.1: Maggahetukaṁ araṇañca maggādhipatiṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:164.1: Maggārammaṇo araṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:165.1: Maggahetuko araṇo dhammo maggahetukassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:166.1: Maggādhipati araṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana4.8:167.1: Maggārammaṇo araṇo ca maggādhipati araṇo ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.8:168.1: Maggahetuko araṇo ca maggādhipati araṇo ca dhammā maggahetukassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:169.1: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, āsevane nava, kamme sattarasa, āhāre …pe… sampayutte sattarasa …pe… avigate sattarasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:171.1: Uppanno saraṇo dhammo uppannassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:172.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye dve, kamme …pe… sampayutte ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:173.1: Uppanno araṇo dhammo uppannassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:174.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:175.1: Paccuppanno saraṇo dhammo paccuppannassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:176.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:177.1: Paccuppanno araṇo dhammo paccuppannassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:178.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… kamme dve …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:180.1: Atītārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:181.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:182.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:185.1: Atītārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:186.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:187.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:190.1: Atītārammaṇo araṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:191.1: Anāgatārammaṇo araṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:192.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo araṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.8:193.1: Atītārammaṇo araṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:194.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā …pe… samanantare satta, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:196.1: Ajjhattaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:197.1: Bahiddhā saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:200.1: Ajjhattaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:201.1: Bahiddhā araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:204.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:205.1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:208.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.8:209.1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:212.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana4.8:213.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:214.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… anantare samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte ekavīsa, aññamaññe cha …pe… upanissaye purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:216.1: Anidassanaappaṭigho araṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.8:217.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte ekavīsa, aññamaññe cha, nissaye ekavīsa, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte cha, pacchājāte satta, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme vipāke āhāre satta, indriye nava, jhāne magge satta, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte aṭṭha …pe… avigate pañcavīsa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
